txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow all the citizens to fall</rgb>
Defend the citizens from the the Corsair raiders.

A group of Pelargir citizens are fleeing from the Corsairs raiders. Now, they've found themselves in a corner with nowhere to run. Protect them until they are safe from their pursuers.

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Keep the citizens alive
